cz.vutbr.fit.gja.gjaddr.persistancelayer

Class Persistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.vutbr.fit.gja.gjaddr.persistancelayer.Persistance

  • public class Persistance
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for data binary serialization. Following class is used in two parts - import/export and database persistence.
    Author:
    Bc. Radek Gajdu≈°ek
